verses.roman:
kavi kahe,--kaha dekhi, kon guṇa-doṣa
prabhu kahena,--kahi, śuna, nā kariha roṣa

synonyms: kavi kahe—the poet said; kaha dekhi—you say "I see"; kon—what; guṇa—qualities; doṣa—faults; prabhu kahena—the Lord replied; kahi—let Me say; śuna—please hear; nā—do not; kariha—become; roṣa—angry.
translation: The poet said, "All right, let me see what qualities and faults You have found." The Lord replied, "Let Me speak, and please hear Me without becoming angry.
